about_the_game:
Our hit series Erotic Fantasy comes to Steam with an animated adventure !

You are an aspiring photographer wanting to explore the beauty and appeal of womens erotic photography. Charm the models and use the right settings on your camera in time to capture a sexy shot.

💋 Sensual Ladies Await !

Indulge in our sensual game and capture a variety of exclusive and intimate images of various models for your viewing pleasure

🕹️ Engaging Gameplay

Test your skills with increasing challenges that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

📖 A Captivating Storyline

Progress through levels to further your career as an aspiring photographer and discover the world of erotic photography as you work towards your very own exhibition.

🎮 Arcade-Styled Bonus Puzzle Mode

For an added challenge, dive into our arcade-inspired mode. Test your skills with a tougher challenge.

Experience a Unique Fusion of Gameplay and Visuals

Don’t miss out on this extraordinary blend of thrilling gameplay, intriguing narrative, and captivating visuals. Grab your copy today, support indie devs and embark on an erotic adventure !

content_descriptors.notes: Erotic animated nudity and sexualised images

name: Erotic Fantasy Hentai Photographer
short_description: Capture stunning and exclusive erotic images of diverse models in bikini, lingerie, and artistic nude shoots. Charm your subjects, master your camera settings, and seize the perfect shots before time runs out !
